claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fox News  (  officially known as the Fox News Channel  )  is an American basic cable and satellite news entertainment television channel owned by the Fox Entertainment Group , a subsidiary of 21st Century Fox .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The channel broadcasts primarily from studios at 1211 Avenue of the Americas , New York City , New York .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The channel was created by Australian-American media mogul Rupert Murdoch , who hired former Republican Party media consultant and CNBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It launched on October 7 , 1996 , to 17 million cable subscribers .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fox News grew during the late 1990s and 2000s to become a dominant cable news network in the United States .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Rupert Murdoch is the current chairman and acting CEO of Fox News .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fox News Channel has been accused of biased reporting and promoting the Republican Party .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Critics have cited the channel as detrimental to the integrity of news overall .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Fox News employees have responded that news reporting operates independently of its opinion and commentary programming , and have denied bias in news reporting .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The network has also been accused of permitting sexual harassment and racial discrimination by on-air hosts , executives , and employees , paying out millions of dollars in legal settlements .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The company is currently under federal investigation for its harassment settlements and other alleged misconduct .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As of February 2015 , approximately 94,700,000 US households  (  81.4 % of cable , satellite & telco customers  )  receive the Fox News Channel .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Meghan Marguerite McCain  (  born October 23 , 1984  )  is an American columnist , author , Fox News host and contributor , and blogger .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She is the daughter of 2008 presidential nominee and long-time U.S. Senator John McCain and Cindy Hensley McCain .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: McCain first received media attention in 2007 for her blog , McCain Blogette , on which she documented life on the campaign trail and mused about fashion , music , and pop culture .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2009 , she became a contributing author for The Daily Beast , and in 2011 , began appearing as a contributor on MSNBC .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2013 , she began hosting on the start-up Pivot channel and in 2014 assumed the co-host role on Pivot 's TakePart Live until that show was canceled later in the year .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In July 2015 , McCain joined Premiere Networks as host of the nationally syndicated radio program America Now .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: McCain also signed on as a FOX News contributor in July 2015 , and was officially named a regular co-host of the afternoon talk program Outnumbered on November 14 , 2016 .

claim: Meghan McCain presents and contributes to Fox News.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Meghan McCain is the daughter of Republican U.S. Senator John McCain of Arizona .
